mapper.update: update vip_search_hot set times = times + 1 where bookId = #{novellId}
mapper.select: SELECT id, AuthorId, BookName, AuthorName, `Desc` AS Description FROM novel_info WHERE MATCH(BookName, AuthorName) AGAINST(#{query} IN NATURAL LANGUAGE MODE) and status != 0 ORDER BY SubscribeNum DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{start};
select id,bookName,bookId,times,status from vip_search_hot where bookId = #{novelId} and status != 0
SELECT id, bookName, bookId, times, status FROM vip_search_hot WHERE status != 0 AND updateTime >= CURDATE() - INTERVAL 10 DAY ORDER BY times DESC LIMIT 100;
